TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> Does renaming into the same name change the name?
> 

That is a question for philosophers rather than moderators.

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, Vanamonde said:
> 
> 
> That is a question for philosophers rather than moderators.
> 

No, I mean if the name will be updated, and the "only one rename per user" rule got performed.

(Or it will be cancelled "Enter another name" and not updated.)

I'm ready to be a guinea pig for such experiment.

**Edited <time datetime="2023-07-21T04:13:52Z" title="07/21/2023 04:13  AM" data-short="Jul 21">July 21, 2023</time> by kerbiloid**
If we try to change a name to what that name already is, the software recognizes that there has been no actual change and ignores it.
I'm requesting my username be changed to Spartan Nat, since that's what my name is on everything else now.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Spartan-B312 said:
> 
> 
> I'm requesting my username be changed to Spartan Nat, since that's what my name is on everything else now.
> 

Okay.

Hello

Could you change, please, my display name to **JiMKesa** ?

JiMKesa is the name i use with my mod.

Actual display name is my real name and i'd like not showing it.

Sorry for my poor english and thanks

Best regards

I'd like mine to be Kimera Industries. When I was setting up my account, I forgot capitalization, and several months afterward, while designing a logo for Kimera Industries, I settled upon a K instead of Ch, as it seemed more Kerbal. The "chimera" was a mythological monster composed of a mishmash of various parts, just like the spacecraft I make.
